title: Add SKU field to Add Product page

requirements.summary: Add a visible, functional SKU input field to the Add Product form that accepts alphanumeric input, is required, and submits with other product fields
acceptanceCriteria: A labeled 'SKU' text input field is visible in the Add Product form on the AdminProductsPage.
The SKU field accepts alphanumeric characters.
The SKU value is included in the product data submitted when the form is saved.
The SKU field shows a validation error if left empty on form submission.
The SKU field is pre-populated when editing an existing product that has a SKU value.

file_operations.description: Add a labeled SKU text input field to the ProductForm component between the name and description fields. The field should be required, accept alphanumeric characters, validate on submission to show an error if empty, and pre-populate when editing an existing product. The SKU value should be included in the form data passed to onSubmit alongside name, description, price, inventory, images, variants, categories, colors, and sizes.
